1537640.name: Save the Pirate: Love Happens + BONUS
1537640.description:
Save the Pirate: Love Happens + BONUS tells the story of the acquaintance of a pirate and his beloved. The player needs to get down to business wisely and make the right choice for the characters to be successful. The main goal - the pirate must save the girl from the robber, so that true love arises between them. To complete the game successfully, you need to use your logic and make the right choice.

As a gift, the player receives secret logic levels about the pirate's escape from prison. The player needs to help the pirate to escape from the dungeon and escape from the rat. During the game, you need to not only make a choice, but also find items that will help you escape.
1537640.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 乌克兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
